dimensions:
Overall: 9/16 in. (1.5 cm)
circumference: 5/16 in. (0.8 cm)
title: bead amulet
description: incised vertically and horizantally overall. barrel-shaped bead of "swrirt" or "swit" started in the Middle kingdom, was worn around the throat of the mummy as part of a necklace. Often inscribed with the owner's name. Because of its location, might be protection from snakebite.
